name: Stairs Crush
description:
STAIRS CRUSH is an endless exciting adventure of the bouncing ball through the STAIRS.

Jump to the ball which has the same color!
Avoid the ball which has different color!
Avoid the spikes!

You guide a bouncing ball up a set of stairs filled with dangers, Bounce as high as you can without landing on a spike or ball which has different color.

Climb as high as you can to score maximum points.

Share your scores and challenge your friends.
Collect gems and make insane perfect combos!

One-tap easy-to learn controls.

Addictive & Challenging.

Easy to learn, hard to master!


Game Features:
- Simple and addictive gameplay: just swipe to control the ball!
- Endless gameplay
- Challenge your friends with the best high score!
- World wide leaderboard!
